home.title: NV & NE ltd
home.subtitle: Umwanya wawe bwite wo gushyiramo, gucunga, no gusesengura amadosiye ukoresheje ubwenge bw'ubukorano.
home.description: Bika amadosiye yawe mu mutekano, kora imihuza yo gusangiza, kandi ufungure ubushishozi mu byo ufite.

auth.greeting: Injira cyangwa ufungure konti nshya kugirango ukomeze.

verification.title: Emeza imeri yawe
verification.description: Kode yo kwemeza yoherejwe kuri {email}. Nyamuneka shyiramo kode hano hepfo kugirango urangize kwiyandikisha.
verification.errorInvalidCode: Kode yo kwemeza si yo. Nyamuneka gerageza nanone.
verification.resendCooldown: Ushobora kongera kohereza kode mu masegonda {seconds}.

main.confirmDelete: Urifuza gusiba iri dosiye? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwamo.
main.creator: Byakozwe na Eric tech

uploader.title: Kurura & Tereka amadosiye yawe hano
uploader.subtitle: cyangwa kanda kugirango ushakishe amadosiye yawe
uploader.errorInvalidFile: Nyamuneka shyiramo dosiye y'amashusho, amajwi, cyangwa ifoto yemewe.

gallery.title: Isomero ryawe ry'Amadosiye
gallery.name: Izina
gallery.emptyDescription: Kanda buto hano hepfo kugirango utangire kandi wongeremo dosiye yawe ya mbere.
gallery.noResultsDescription: Ishakisha ryawe n'ibyo wahisemo ntibihuye n'amadosiye ariho.

player.errorDescription: Dosiye ishobora kuba yangiritse cyangwa idahari.

share.title: Sangiza Dosiye
share.linkDescription: Umuntu wese ufite uyu muhuza ashobora kureba iyi dosiye muri iyi sesiyo y'ikoresha.
share.embedDescription: Koporora no komora iyi kode kugirango ushyire iyi dosiye ku rubuga rwawe.
share.note: Icyitonderwa: Uyu muhuza ni uw'igihe gito kandi ukora gusa kuri iki gikoresho mu gihe cya sesiyo yawe. Ku bika bihoraho, shyira dosiye kuri serivisi yabugenewe.

aiPanel.title: Baza kuri Dosiye
aiPanel.notSupportedDescription: Mbabarira, isesengura rya AI ku madosiye y'amajwi ntiriremerwa.

settings.title: Igenamiterere
settings.darkModeDesc: Gabanya urumuri kandi utezimbere ireme ryo kureba nijoro.
settings.loopMediaDesc: Subiramo amashusho/amajwi mu buryo bwikora iyo arangiye.
settings.cinemaModeDesc: Bitanga isura nziza y'inyuma ku mashusho.
settings.dataManagementDesc: Siba burundu amadosiye yose washyizemo mu bubiko bw'ikoresha ryawe. Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwamo.
settings.confirmClearAll: Urifuza gusiba amadosiye yawe YOSE? Iki gikorwa ntigishobora gusubizwamo.

help.title: Ibyerekeye NV & NE ltd
help.summaryTitle: Incamake yo ku Rwego rwo Hejuru
help.summaryText: Iyi porogaramu ni porogaramu y'urubuga igezweho kandi y'ubuhanga ikora nk'uburyo bwite kandi bw'umutekano bwo gucunga amashusho bukorerwa mu ikoresha ryawe. Ni {creator} development Software aho abakoresha bashobora kwiyandikisha, kwinjira, gucunga isomero ryabo ryite ry'amashusho, no gukoresha ubwenge bw'ubukorano bukomeye mu gusesengura no gusubiza ibibazo ku bikubiye mu mashusho.
help.featureAuth: Kwemeza k'umukoresha mu mutekano: Harimo kwiyandikisha kuzuye, kwinjira, n'inzira yo kwemeza imeri hamwe na "Nyibuka" no gusohoka.
help.featureMediaManagement: Gucunga amashusho mu buryo bukomeye: Ikoresha IndexedDB y'ikoresha ryawe kugirango ibike amashusho mu buryo bwihuse, bwite, kandi bukora offline. Uburyo bworoshye bwo gushyiramo amashusho bwo gukurura no gutereka.
help.featurePlayer: Umukinnyi w'amashusho w'ubuhanga: Ufite umukinnyi wihariye n'uburyo bwa Sinema butanga isura nziza y'inyuma y'amabara y'ishusho.
help.featureAI: Isesengura ry'amashusho rikoreshejwe na AI: Igice gikomeye cyane cya porogaramu. Ushobora kubaza AI incamake y'ishusho cyangwa kubaza ibibazo byihariye ku biyikubiyemo. Porogaramu yohereza amakuru y'ishusho mu mutekano kuri moderi y'ubwenge bw'ubukorano kugirango isesengure.
help.featureShare: Uburyo bworoshye bwo gusangiza: Ako kanya kora umuhuza wo gusangiza cyangwa kode yo gushyiramo ya HTML <iframe> ku ishusho iyo ari yo yose. Icyitonderwa, ibi ni iby'igihe gito kandi bishingiye kuri sesiyo.
help.featureWatermark: Ikimenyetso cy'amazi gihindagurika: Ikimenyetso cyoroheje kandi kigenda cy'izina ryawe ry'ukoresha gishobora kwerekanwa ku mashusho yawe. Gishobora guhindurwa mu igenamiterere.
help.featureSettings: Igenamiterere ry'umukoresha ryihariye: Hindura uburambe bwawe uhindura uburyo bwijimye, gusubiramo amashusho, uburyo bwa Sinema, n'ikimenyetso cy'amazi.
help.stackFrontend: Urwego rw'imbere: React hamwe na TypeScript
help.stackAI: Guhuza AI: Isesengura rikoreshejwe na AI
help.stackStorage: Ububiko bw'ibanze: IndexedDB (ku madosiye y'amashusho) na LocalStorage (ku makuru y'umukoresha/igenamiterere)
help.createdByText: Iyi porogaramu yakozwe ku giti cye na {creator}.
help.supportText1: Iyi porogaramu n'ibiyigize byose bigenzurwa kandi bicungwa na {creator}.
help.supportText2: Ku bibazo byose by'ubufasha, ibibazo, cyangwa ibyo ushaka kumenya, nyamuneka twandikire kuri imeri yacu y'igenzura: {email}.
help.troubleshootingIntro: Niba uhuye n'ibibazo, nyamuneka gerageza intambwe zikurikira mbere:
help.troubleUpload: Gushyiramo amashusho byananiranye: Emeza ko ukoresha uburyo busanzwe bw'amashusho (nka MP4 cyangwa WebM) kandi ko ikoresha ryawe rifite umwanya uhagije.
help.troubleAI: Ikosa mu isesengura rya AI: Reba interineti yawe. Urufunguzo rwa API rwa serivisi ya AI rugomba kuba rwateguwe neza mu bidukikije bya porogaramu kugirango iki gice gikore.
help.troubleGeneral: Ibibazo rusange: Gerageza gufungura urupapuro nanone cyangwa gusukura cache y'ikoresha ryawe kuri uru rubuga.
